game.beginning: The world has changed. A cataclysm of unimaginable proportions has ravaged the land and left a lingering threat over every corner of the once-peaceful planet.
game.ending: The battle for the planet's future rests in the hands of a ragtag team of heroes, who must rise up against the oppressive powers that stand between them and victory. They must unite, or the world is doomed.
game.synopsis: Humanity's only hope - the remnants of its great infrastructure - now stands between the surviving factions and a final, inevitable conflict. The clock is ticking, and time is short.
game.title: The Last Stand
